content.raw: Oops, I didn't realize I had ign-math2 on my machine, so I incorrectly inferred that gazebo7 accepted ign-math3 as well. However, I do have ign-math2. It looks like it was built from source. It must have been built after [the change](https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-math/pull-requests/91) was merged into default but while default still had 2 as the major version in CMakeLists because it claims to be version 2.6.0 but has the `explicit` specifier. I reinstalled ign-math2 and that fixed the error. Thanks Ian!
content.html: Oops, I didn't realize I had ign-math2 on my machine, so I incorrectly inferred that gazebo7 accepted ign-math3 as well. However, I do have ign-math2. It looks like it was built from source. It must have been built after the change was merged into default but while default still had 2 as the major version in CMakeLists because it claims to be version 2.6.0 but has the explicit specifier. I reinstalled ign-math2 and that fixed the error. Thanks Ian!
